means: Ⅰ安提柯一世(公元前382?～前301)，马其顿国王亚历山大的将领，后为马其顿国王(前306～前301)[称作 Cyclops，“独眼”安提柯]

PerfectNetExp.abs: 安提柯(Antigonus)进入亚洲。亚力山大葬于孟菲斯(Memphis)。

means.word_mean: 1. a general of Alexander the Great and king of Macedonia; lost one eye; killed in a battle at Ipsus (382-301 BC)
